metadata.title: CVE-2018-11407 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Ldap component in Symfony 2.8.x before2.8.37, 3.3.x before 3.3.17, 3.4.x before 3.4.7, and 4.0.x before 4.0.7. Itallows remote attackers to bypass authentication by logging in with a"null" password and valid username, which triggers an unauthenticated bind. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-2403.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
